newsitem.title: JAPAN: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.
newsitem.headline: Kobe rubber futures mixed in after-hours trade.

text.p: Kobe rubber futures were mixed in the after-hours session on Friday in trade dominated by sporadic position-adjustment ahead of the spot expiry next Monday, traders said.
Prices ranged from 0.3 yen per kg lower to 0.3 yen firmer than the day's close. Benchmark January was 0.3 yen down at 137.7 yen. Volume was thin, with 4,582 lots traded.
During the day, spot August rose on short-covering, which spilled over into other contracts, they said.
"Investors stood on the sidelines amid uncertainty over near-term direction after the spot expiry," one trader said.
